recognition process, where abstract activities, i.e., dynamic and static activity, are
ﬁrst recognized using a 2-class or binary classiﬁer, and then individual activities are
recognized using two 3-class classiﬁers.
— Divide and Conquer-Based 1D CNN Human Activity Recognition Using Test Data
Sharpening, 2018.
